trans-unit.source: Transforms data in a Web Parts connection from a provider that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow"></xref> interface to a consumer expecting to receive data from a provider that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters"></xref> interface.
Transformers are used in a Web Parts connection to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> class transforms data from a provider implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface to a consumer expecting to receive data from a provider that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the list of names in the consumer that will receive the values from the provider.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.ConsumerFieldNames%2A> property represents the fields in the consumer that will receive the transformed data from the provider.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.ConsumerFieldNames%2A> property can be set by the user through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> configuration control, or set declaratively in the `<asp:RowToParametersTransformer />` element, where as many consumer field names as needed are assigned to the `ConsumerFieldNames` attribute, in the form `ConsumerFieldNames="fieldA,fieldB"`.
An array of <xref href="System.String"></xref> values representing the consumer fields.

Provides an ASP.NET control that allows the user to configure a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer"></xref> transformer in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> zone.
A Web Parts connection can be established statically or dynamically.
A static connection is defined within the `<StaticConnections>` element.
A user can define a dynamic connection when a connections zone is included in a Web page and the user is in the connect mode.
When establishing a dynamic connection, the user defines the connection through a configuration control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.CreateConfigurationControl%2A> method returns the control that the user interacts with to define the connection.

The configuration control displays a UI that allows the user to connect or disconnect a provider and consumer, and select which field from the provider row data to connect with the field data of the consumer.
The control is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> zone.
An ASP.NET control that displays a user interface (UI) that allows the user to configure a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer"></xref>.
Gets or sets the list of field names from the provider.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.ProviderFieldNames%2A> property represents the fields in the provider that the transformer will pass to the consumer.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.ProviderFieldNames%2A> property can be set by the user through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> configuration control, or set declaratively in the `<asp:RowToParametersTransformer />` element, where as many provider field names as needed are assigned to the `ProviderFieldNames` attribute, in the form `ProviderFieldNames="fieldA,fieldB"`.
An array of <xref href="System.String"></xref> values representing the provider fields.
Provides an object for transforming the data.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.Transform%2A> method provides an object for transforming the provider data from the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> to the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> so it can be used by the consumer.
The provider data to be transformed.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the data to be transformed.
Gets the value of the data from the connection provider.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface.
The delegate instance to be used when retrieving a value.
callback equals `null`.
Gets the schema information for a data field that is used to share data between two Web Parts controls.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> containing the data schema.

Sets the property descriptors for the properties that the consumer receives when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ParametersCallback)"></xref> method is called.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface.

The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> object returned by <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.System#Web#UI#WebControls#WebParts#IWebPartParameters#Schema"></xref>.
